title: Chronicles of an Extreme Yandere - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Gore   Male Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Yandere

description: For your sake, I don’t care even if I’m to face against the entire world. The young girl’s extreme love obsession had already deeply hurt the young boy…. Years later, the boy had already grown up; he understood that he cannot face the other party’s feelings head on, so he chose to forget…. but little did he know about the kind of path that he walked on to, and what waited for him there, will be...>
